name: Fire Extinguisher CBM
description: A small, retractable launcher resides in the palm of your hand through your arm. The system will automatically produce small gelatinous orbs that when launched into fire will rapidly expand into a fire fighting foam.
This module upgrades a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and limited automatic radiation scrubbing capabilities.
A system of tanks and filters that are connected to a microreactor to extract plutonium from radioactive slurry.

This stripped down mini-reactor will generate impressive amounts of bionic power, but may not be the safest thing to install.  Once active, it cannot be shut down and will slowly contaminate the user's body with radiation.
A kit for upgrading a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and limited automatic radiation scrubbing capabilities.
